title: Police: Man charged with aggravated burglary after pretending to need bathroom
content: Police say a man pretended to have to use the bathroom before attacking his victim. (WKRC)      CINCINNATI (WKRC) - Police say a man pretended to have to use the bathroom before attacking his victim.    Demar Evans was in court Saturday morning, charged with aggravated burglary. In May, Lavon Murell let Evans into his Winton Hills apartment on Bettman Drive.    Once inside, the 32-year-old allegedly pulled out a gun and started pistol whipping Murell.    Murell escaped and contacted police. Officers arrested Evans Friday. His bond was set at $15
